install.name: Qivva EventList Calendar module
install.author: Toni Smillie
install.description:
Qivva EventList Calendar Module for Joomla 1.5.x from http://extensions.qivva.com

Version 0.93

Changes for v0.93:

Added nofollow to month links

Fixed accents problem with htmlentities

Common template padding problem with th fixed - now declares 0px padding

Use upgrade method for install

Separate switch for current and archive events - so now can get both at the same time

Internal - Title Separator changed from + to +%+%+

Fix for double slash in stylesheet reference

Allow user defined stylesheets

UTF-8 fix for mb_substr and mb_convert_case

Changes for v0.91:

Fix for Go straight to Event

Changes for v0.91:

1. Fix for bug with Use Joomla language and starting week on Monday

2. Better xml file for grouped parameters

3. Another Joomfish fix for category and venue tooltip translation

* Changes for v0.9

* 1. Fix for Joomfish translation of tooltips

* 2. Singular and Plural for Tooltips title in parameters

* 3. Choose whether to display tooltips title. (Default = On)

* 4. Go Straight To Details if there is only 1 event on a date (Default = On)

* 5. Display Category in Tooltips (Default = Off)

* 6. Display Venue in Tooltips (Default = Off)

* 7. Option to display archived events calendar (Default = Off)

* 8. Use the default Joomla language names for Days and Months (Default = On)

* 9. Fix roll over year end bug for Offset calendar

* 10. Time offset parameter - Use ONLY if your server time seems to differ from your timezone.

* Changes for v0.8

* 1. Roll over year end bug fixed

* 2. Check for mb_substr

* 3. Remove hardcoded text align center (now uses stylesheet)

* Changes for v0.7

* 1. Removed JDate - as it was causing too many date/time problems

* 2. Better tool tips

* From v0.6

* 2. XHTML validation fixes

* 3. Tests if mbstring functions are installed before using them, defaults to ucfirst if no mb_convert_case

* 4. Allows a calendar offset so can have multiple calendars displaying different months

param.name: Default_Stylesheet
param.label: Use Default Stylesheet
param.description: Use the default stylesheet modules/mod_eventlistcal15q/mod_eventlistcal15q.css

param.name: User_stylesheet
param.label: User Stylesheet
param.description: Use an alternative stylesheet e.g. modules/mod_eventlistcal15q/mystylesheet.css

param.name: Show_Tooltips
param.label: Show Tooltips?
param.description: Choose to show tooltips on mouse rollover on calendar dates.

param.name: Show_Tooltips_Title
param.label: Show Tooltips Title?
param.description: Choose to show the tooltips title.

param.name: cal15q_tooltips_title
param.label: ToolTips Title (Singular)
param.description: Define the tooltips title (Singular)

param.name: cal15q_tooltipspl_title
param.label: ToolTips Title (Plural)
param.description: Define the tooltips title (Plural)

param.name: DisplayCat
param.label: Display Category in Tooltip?
param.description: Display the Category in the Tooltip

param.name: DisplayVenue
param.label: Display Venue in Tooltip?
param.description: Display the Venue in the Tooltip

param.name: UseJoomlaLanguage
param.label: Use Joomla Language for Days/Months?
param.description: Use the default Joomla language for Day and Month names

param.name: day_name_length
param.label: Length of the Dayname
param.description: Select if you want to display the full dayname or a short version

param.name: first_day
param.label: Start week
param.description: Start the week at sunday or monday

param.name: Year_length
param.label: Year Length
param.description: Select to show 2 or 4 letters

param.name: Month_length
param.label: Short month name?
param.description: Select if you wish to display the full month name or not.

param.name: Month_offset
param.label: Month Offset
param.description: Offset the month so enter 1 for a month ahear, -1 for a month behind etc

param.name: Time_offset
param.label: Time Offset (Hours)
param.description: Use this ONLY if you need to offset your time from the server settings

param.name: Remember
param.label: Remember?
param.description: Remember which month/year is selected on page change, no jumping back to current day.

param.name: CurrentEvents
param.label: Show Current Events
param.description: Show current events. Do not set both this and Archive events to No otherwise NO events will show

param.name: ArchivedEvents
param.label: Show Archived Events
param.description: Show archive events. Do not set both this and Current events to No otherwise NO events will show

param.name: StraightToDetails
param.label: Go Straight To Details?
param.description: Go straight to the details page when there is only one event to choose from

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: locale_override
param.label: Locale Override
param.description: Define the server locale you want the calendar to use to override the default - this can only be used if NOT using the default Joomla langauge

param.name: catid
param.label: CATEGORY ID
param.description: Category ID - Display a calendar only for the categories chosen, separate IDs with commas e.g. 1,3

param.name: venid
param.label: VENUE ID
param.description: Venue ID - Display a calendar only for the venue(s) chosen, separate IDs with commas e.g. 1,3
